bug24062.js(4,1): error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.


==== bug24062.js (1 errors) ====
    // #24062
    class C {
    }
    module.exports = {
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        C
    ~~~~~
    };
    ~
!!! error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.
